perturbation.original_text: 3.3 PAYMENT. All payments to PivX shall be made within thirty (30) days after the receipt by Detto of the PivX's invoice. Detto shall pay PivX a late charge on outstanding amounts due equal to one and one-half percent (1.50%) per month or the maximum amount allowed by law, whichever is less.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.3 PAYMENT. All payments to PivX shall be made within sixty (60) days after the receipt by Detto of the PivX's invoice. Detto shall pay PivX a late charge on outstanding amounts due equal to one and one-half percent (1.50%) per month or the maximum amount allowed by law, whichever is less.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment deadline from 30 days to 60 days, while other clauses might still refer to the original 30-day deadline or assume prompt payment within that timeframe. This creates uncertainty about when payments are actually due and when late charges apply.

perturbation.original_text: 5.1 TERM OF AGREEMENT. The term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and continue for six (6) months.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.1 TERM OF AGREEMENT. The term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and continue for twelve (12) months.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by modifying the contract term from 6 months to 12 months. This will create conflicting interpretations regarding the overall length of the contractual agreement.

perturbation.original_text: 5.2 TERMINATION OF AGREEMENT. PivX may terminate this Agreement for convenience by giving at least thirty (30) days written notice of termination to Detto.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.2 TERMINATION OF AGREEMENT. PivX may terminate this Agreement for convenience by giving at least sixty (60) days written notice of termination to Detto.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by modifying the required notice period for termination for convenience. This creates conflict when determining the timing of a proper termination and any associated liabilities.
